recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup diced red onion (about 1/2 of a small red onion)
2 slices of ham, cut into small pieces (optional)
Juice from one half of a lime
Salt and black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Toss all ingredients together, and let sit for half an hour in the refrigerator.
